title: PJ's Backyard Adventures: Who is PJ?
description: "PJ's Backyard Adventures - Who is PJ?" is an interactive adventure book for ages 2-8 that engages a child's imagination and joy of learning through coloring, reading, hidden sight words, creative play, and geography. Cut out PJ on the back to take him with you on your adventures. Adults love that it encourages both outdoor and global exploration and kids are simply having fun! "Where will you take PJ?"  "PJ's Backyard Adventures - Who is PJ?" is the first in a series from Rebecca P. Cohen, the author of "15 Minutes 365 Ways to Get Out of the House and Connect with Your Kids" and creator of Rebecca Plants Curiosity Cards.
author: Rebecca P. Cohen
